name: Y-Klub
overview:
Y-Klub developed SmartKal, an interactive calendar for Facebook users and also an iPhone version.

Y-Klub is a privately funded company based out of San Francisco, CA and is looking for Super-Angel investors for future endeavors.

SmartKal is a useful, fun, social application that is growing fast. Unlike other calendars, with SmartKal, you can instantly fill up your social calendar. View your friends’ social events and with a single click download the events you like to your own calendar! This is also possible for events of Business Fan pages that the user has Liked. All these features on iPhone as well. Other mobile phones will be supported soon

With SmartKal, you can view your friends’ calendars, share your plans while using custom privacy settings for EACH entry. Friends can comment on each other’s entries.

SmartKal also allows you to send invitations, RSVP to events. The Search functionality is very powerful.

SmartKal takes a traditional concept of a calendar and puts an exciting new twist to it, making it truly social and interactive.

Fan page: http://www.facebook.com/smartkal
